devdoc.author: Khalid F.Sh
devdoc.details: contract for adding, removing and checking an address in the container '_retailers' Role.

amIRetailer().return: boolean for caller address state in `_retailers` Role

isRetailer(address).return: boolean for this address state in `_retailers` Role

devdoc.title: A Retailer Role Contract

methods.constructor: constructer will assign the deployer as 1st retailer
